alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL HARDING, NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Hayden, or 13 miles southwest of Amistad, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nara Visa, Amistad and Hayden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern and east central New Mexico.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Quay County; Union County
